TI: Hippocampal Dentate Mossy Cells Improve Their CV and Trk into the Limelight.
AB: The impact of dentate mossy cells on hippocampal activity remained uncertain despite a long history of investigation. In this issue of Neuron, Hashimotodani et al. (2017) discover a presynaptically expressed form of long-term potentiation at mossy cell outputs, shedding light on their mysterious function.
